Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class TextUserInterface

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.TextUserInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface, Runnable
public class TextUserInterface extends Object implements UserInterface
Handles the TUI of the game
